title: 12/13/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 12/13/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the weekend in sports. At this point who's his favorite to win it all? Albert Breer discusses the rumors surrounding Ryan Day and the Bears. And Carson Palmer explains why Trevor Lawrence will have a long leash compared to Urban
